italic.text: To move to a position in order to be transported by other unit(s)

line.text: In Sword to be transported by another unit. This mission is used to coordinate the troops and vehicules transportation (see transportation capabilities in authoring tool), when SWORD is connected to other simulations through an HLA federation.
Lines used by units to adapt their behavior when they reach or cross them.
Right or left boundaries inside which the agent perform the mission.
Right or left boundaries inside which the agent perform the mission.

The agent moves toward the given position. If it is not reachable (a urban block inside which the agent cannot move for instance), the agent moves as close as possible, else it moves to the center of the position. Average speed depends on the physical capabilities regarding the terrain properties.
Upon reaching the position, the agent is ready to be transported (the report "waiting for carriers" is displayed).
The mission ends once the unit has been unloaded from carrier (even if the transportation is not complete, if the carrier is destroyed for instance).
